abstract: The suit, filed by a rights group, was based on Cisco sales materials. Cisco said there was “no basis” for the claims and that it would “vigorously” defend itself.
snippet: The suit, filed by a rights group, was based on Cisco sales materials. Cisco said there was “no basis” for the claims and that it would “vigorously” defend itself.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Cisco, the maker of Internet routing gear, customized its technology to help China track members of the Falun Gong spiritual movement, according to a federal lawsuit filed last week by members of the movement.

headline.main: Suit Claims Cisco Helped China Pursue Falun Gong
headline.print_headline: Suit Claims Cisco Helped China Pursue Falun Gong
